name: I'd prefer to be an orb.
name_original: I'd prefer to be an orb.
description:
A short little game about having a body and not having a body.

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Confirm choices with right-arrow.

Made with Bitsy.

Made with the help of Bitsy Savior, Borksy, Bitsy Muse, and these five hacks (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) by Sean S. Leblanc, and lots of troubleshooting from several really super duper folks in the Bitsy Discord.

Bedroom tileset from Teaceratops Games.
